CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 哪一个；哪些；哪一些；那一个；那些；…的那个；…的那些
哪个；哪些；那个；那些；无论哪个；无论哪些

word_group.brief_definition: 不知该怎么办；彻底地迷惘
word_group.phrase: not know which way to turn
see which way the cat jumps

word_group.brief_definition: 不知该怎么办；彻底地迷惘
word_group.phrase: not know which where to turn

word_group.brief_definition: 明白自己的利益之所在；善于为自己打算
word_group.phrase: know which side one's bread is buttered on

word_group.brief_definition: 明白自己的利益之所在；善于为自己打算
word_group.phrase: know which side one's bread is buttered
know which side your bread is buttered

word_group.brief_definition: 看看风向；观察势头；摸清可能发生的情况
word_group.phrase: see which way the wind is blowing

bilingual.source: Which would you most like to do?
Which would you most like to try? Why?
bilingual.target: 你最想尝试哪一个？为什么？

bilingual.source: Which one do you think is better?
Which web browser do you like the most?
bilingual.target: 你最喜欢的网络浏览器是哪一个？
你最喜欢的娱乐场所是哪一个？
你最喜欢的广播电台是哪一个？

bilingual.source: I don't mind which one we have - you decide.
bilingual.target: 我不介意我们有哪一个-你决定。

list.abstract: which，英文单词，用于定位一个程序文件，包含别名和路径。 which在R语言中主要用于条件筛选。
which，英语单词，主要用作代词、限定词、形容词，作代词时意为“ 哪一个，哪一些；（指明事物）……的那个，……的那些；（进一步提供有关某事物的信息）那个，那些”，作限定词时意为“ 哪一个，哪一些；（指明事物）……的那个，……的那些；（进一步提供有关某事物的信息）那个，那些”，作形容词时意为“哪一个，哪一些；无论哪个；（进一步提供有关某事物的信息）那个，那些”。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, which one is Bonnie again?
yingyinNormal.zh: 邦妮是哪一个？

yingyinNormal.en: No you're not, you're wondering which cushion it is.
yingyinNormal.zh: 才怪，你在想是哪一个垫子。

yingyinNormal.en: All these photos are up to date, but which one pulled the trigger, Sherlock? Which one?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些照片都是最新的，但是谁开的枪，夏洛克，哪一个？

yingyinNormal.en: How can you not know which one? I mean that's unbelievable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你怎么会不知道是哪一个？ 简直无法置信。

yingyinNormal.en: Learn which of the 12 zodiac animals is associated with that year's celebration.
yingyinNormal.zh: 知道新年即将庆祝哪一个生肖。

yingyinNormal.en: You're gonna tell me exactly which rig she's in and the access code to contact her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你得告诉我她具体在哪一个舱还有她的识别码。

yingyinNormal.en: Which hard drive do I want, Firewire or USB? It depends on what bus you have available.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我应该选哪一个硬盘，火线还是USB？这取决于你有什么总线(bus还有大巴士的意思)。

yingyinNormal.en: Which do I like? Yeah, you know, for dating, general merriment, taking back to your windmill?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我喜欢哪一个？对，你会挑哪一个约会，找乐子、带回你的“磨坊”？

yingyinNormal.en: When which ever one she is comes to the door, you take her for a walk, you let her down easy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不管她是哪一个，她到门口来的时候，请她去散个步，给她留点面子。

yingyinNormal.en: The faculty is completing midyear reviews. We're deciding which placement applications to support.
yingyinNormal.zh: 教员们正在写期中评语。我门正在决定支持哪一个就业工作。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know which woman you mean. You know what I'd do? Put the gun in my hand, I'd shoot her myself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不知道你说的是哪一个。你知道我会怎么做吗？给我一枝枪，我会亲手杀了她。

yingyinNormal.en: We have to find out which one the father is. How? I don't know. They have tests for these things, right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们一定得查出哪一个是孩子的父亲。怎么查？我不知道，这种事儿可以测出来的，对吧？

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, you know what, I've had enough of this. Let's just cut to the chase. Okay? Heidi, which of my boys do you like?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我受够了，干脆直截了当一点，海蒂，你喜欢哪一个？

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig will read you one story. Now, which book do you want? The Red Monkey book. OK, I'll read you The Red Monkey book.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸只能给你们读一个故事，你们想听哪一个？我想听红猴子的故事。好的，那我就来读红猴子这个故事。

yingyinNormal.en: Which do you think she'd prefer? Because I checked the Sheep and Wool Festival Web site, and there's only 8,000 tickets left.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们觉得她最喜欢哪一个？因为我查过羊及羊毛节的官网，只剩8千张票了。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig will read you one story. Now, which book do you want? "The Red Monkey" book. OK, I'll read you "The Red Monkey" book.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸只能给你们读一个故事，你们想听哪一个？我想听红猴子的故事。好的，那我就来读红猴子这个故事。

yingyinNormal.en: No, you stay here and get better. But I've got so much work to do. I'll do your work for you. Which job is first? The supermarket.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不行，你最好待在这里好好休养一下。但是我还有好多工作要做。我可以去帮你做你的工作，你先做哪一个。我要先去超市。

yingyinNormal.en: No, you stay here and get better. But I've got so much work to do. I'll do your work for you. Which job is first? The supermarket.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不行，你最好待在这里好好休养一下。但是我还有好多工作要做。我可以去帮你做你的工作，你先做哪一个。我要先去超市。

yingyinNormal.en: Which MIT did you go to?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你去的是哪家麻省理工来着？

yingyinNormal.en: Which gets you to Lanagin.
yingyinNormal.zh: 于是你想到了拉尼根。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: relative det. & pron. 无论哪个；无论哪些；不论哪个；不论哪些

word_family.mean: interrogative pron. & det. 哪一个；哪一些

examination_example.sentence: California's plan, <highlight>which</highlight> is expected to be finalized by the governor next year, should serve as a model.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加利福尼亚州的计划预计将在明年由州长最终确定，它应该作为一个典范。

examination_example.sentence: Sure enough, firms investment and R&D intensity were correlated with the happiness of the area in <highlight>which</highlight> they were headquartered.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毫无疑问，企业的投资和R&D（研发）强度与其总部所在地区的幸福感相关。

examination_example.sentence: Make a print product for the people who are already obsessed with it, <highlight>which</highlight> may be what the Times is doing already.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为已经痴迷的人制作印刷品，这可能是《纽约时报》已经在做的事情。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Which</highlight> is considered a weakness of the city-level measures to tackle dirty air?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 哪一项被认为是城市级别解决空气污染措施的弱点？

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Which</highlight> of the following would be the best title for the text?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以下哪一项会是本文的最佳标题?

examination_example.sentence: An old saying has it that half of all advertising budgets are wasted — the trouble is, no one knows <highlight>which</highlight> half.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有句老话说，所有广告预算的一半都被浪费了——问题是，没有人知道是哪一半。

word_usage.usage:
that和which都可引导定语从句，但以下情况引导定语从句的关系代词只能用that不能用which:
1.先行词是all，everything，nothing，anything，little等不定代词，或被first，last，only，few，much，some，any，no等词或形容词最高级修饰时
2.先行词既有人也有物时
3.强调句型“It is/was...that/who...”中

that和which都可引导定语从句，但以下情况只能用which不能用that：
1.定语从句由介词+关系代词引导，且该关系代词代替的是物而不是人时，用which；
2.非限制性定语从句所修饰的是物或是整个主句时,关系代词用which，不用that。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: relative det. & pron. 无论哪个；无论哪些；不论哪个；不论哪些

word_family.mean: interrogative pron. & det. 哪一个；哪一些

examination_example.sentence: Make a note of any page <highlight>which</highlight> is of special importance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 记下任何特别重要的一页。

examination_example.sentence: A history book <highlight>which</highlight> may contain the facts in story form will be easier to read than one dealing with scientific subjects.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一本可能以故事形式包含事实的历史书比一本涉及科学主题的书更容易阅读。

examination_example.sentence: Of the following stadiums, <highlight>which</highlight> is the oldest?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以下哪个体育场是最古老的？

word_usage.usage:
which和that在定语从句中都可以指物，一般没有什么区别，但在下列情况中必须用that：
①先行词是all、much、everything、nothing、anything、few、little、none等不定代词时：Is there anything else that I can do for you? 还有什么我能为你效劳的吗？
②先行词由序数词修饰时：The first place that we visited was the Science Museum. 我们参观的第一个地方是科学博物馆。
③先行词由最高级修饰时：This is the best film that I have ever seen. 这是我看过的最好的电影。
④先行词被last、any、only、no、very等修饰时：You can take any room that you like. 你可以住你喜欢的任何一个房间。
⑤如果先行词是人和物，既不能用who(m) 又不能用which，只能用that：He told me of the man and the place that I had never heard of. 他跟我讲了我从来没有听说过的人和地方。

在下列情况下，只能用which，而不能用that：
①在非限制性定语从句中：Nothing is more important to us than the sun, which gives us light and heat. 对于我们来说没有什么比太阳更重要了，它给我们提供光和热。
②在“名词或代词+介词+关系代词”的结构中：There are many books on his shelf,some of which are about children education. 他的书架上有很多书，有些是关于儿童教育的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Which</highlight> of the following isn't a traditional Chinese art form?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以下哪种不是中国传统艺术形式？

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Which</highlight> of the following can be used to describe the girl in the picture？
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下面哪一个可以用来描述图片中的女孩?

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>which</highlight> country do children pick up things on their first birthdays?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 哪个国家的孩子在一岁生日的时候会捡东西？

examination_example.sentence: Climate change is bad for us human beings, <highlight>which</highlight> causes direct health problems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 气候变化对我们人类不利，这会直接导致健康问题。

examination_example.sentence: Traditional Chinese drama, including Beijing Opera, is a kind of entertainment <highlight>which</highlight> includes spoken parts, singing, dancing and acrobatics.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 包括京剧在内的中国传统戏剧是一种包括口语、歌唱、舞蹈和杂技在内的娱乐活动。

examination_example.sentence: The city got its name from the Roman Baths, <highlight>which</highlight> was a place for public bathing in Roman Britain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这座城市的名字来源于罗马浴场，那是罗马不列颠的一个公共浴场。

word_usage.usage:
which 和 what 均可做疑问词与名词连用。选择范围较小或比较明确时，用which;选择范围较大或不明确时用what。
示例：(1) Which is bigger, the sun or the earth?
太阳和地球哪个大?
(2) What writers do you like?
你喜欢哪些作家?

which和what均可以做先行词，但是which 可以引导定语从句，what 不能引导定语从句， 示例：
他在1935年写的那本书仍然很畅销。
误 The book what he wrote in 1935 still sells well.
正 The book which he wrote in 1935 still sells well.
